parameters.content:
## **Preparo do arquivo de entrada**
(Assume arquivo creditcard.csv.zip no root folder do google drive)
1. Download do zip contendo CSV, creditcard.csv.zip (67.5 MB)
2. Descompactar Zip (CSV 147.3 MB)
3. Converter o numero dado de registros para formato JSON

## **Preparo de Meatadata e dados para o Pinecone Vector Store**

1. Computar Metadata para Pinecone
2. Criar os Embeddings para o Pinecone

options.systemMessage: You are an expert Credit Card Fraud Detection Data Analyst. Your job is to retrieve data from Pinecone and output structured JSON for visualization. When users request analysis, you should: 1) Retrieve relevant data from Pinecone, 2) Analyze using Code Tool, 3) Provide text explanation, 4) Output JSON in this format wrapped in ```json code blocks: {"analysisType": "distribution|comparison|temporal", "title": "Title in Portuguese", "description": "What this represents", "data": {"labels": ["Cat1", "Cat2"], "values": [123, 456], "metadata": {}}, "insights": ["insight 1", "insight 2"], "recommendedVisualization": "bar|pie|line"}. You do NOT create charts - just provide clean data.

parameters.content:
## **Front-end - Send  HTML Page for analysis**

1. Define API fraud-api URL
2. Send HTML Page with Java Script to read responses from User Chat and call APIs fraud-api

## **API para carga do arquivo**

1.  Define API fraud-load-api to start the data base load process
2.  Seta variaveis com parametros de carga como 
2.1 URL do Index do pinecone
2.2 Api-key do pinecone
2.3 Numero de registros para carga no pinecone (rate limit faz velocidade da carga de ~ 30,000 registros/hora)

## **Formatacao da Resposta**

1. Clean AI Agent Output as pure JSON
2. Test if the response contain a chart
3. If does contain a chart
3.1 Prepare for visualization using QuickChart
3.2 Format QuickChart URL
4. If does not contain a chart, clean the chart fields
5. Prepare data to be processed by front-end java script

## **Front-end - Send  Main HTML Page**

1. Set the URL
2. Send HTML Page with options for load or analysis (API fraud-load-api or fraud-chat)

## **Front-end - Send  HTML Page for Loading**

1. Define API fraud-load-api URL
2. Send HTML Page with Java Script to read responses with load parameters and call API (fraud-Load-api)

parameters.content:
## **API para Analise estatistica**

1.  Define API fraud-api to start the AI Agent for statistical analysis
2.  Formata entrada de dados

## **Front-end - Upload zip file to Google drive**

1. Define API upload-zip URL
2. Send HTML Page with to read path\name of the file to be uploaded and name on google drive (Root) folder

Important (This workflow always look for file creditcard.csv.zip in root folder
